comment: A good, fun, and smart professor. Last I heard KSU didn't invite him back for another year but if he did come back I would diffidently take him again for 1102. KSU shouldn't let good professors like Mr. Simpson go.
Great teacher, has a good since of humor. While attendance is not mandatory I would highly recommend going to class if you want an A

TOO Bad he's Retiring because he looks out for his Students as long as you look out for the Environment. Very Relatable. It's teachers like him that we need more in our schools. I cant say more because he is no longer teaching, however, it was a pleasure taking his class.
TAKE THIS GUY!! Easy class, knows what hes talking about and makes the class fun.

Dr. Simpson is incredible. He is a great teacher. 3 tests. That's your grade. They are multiple choice & a piece of cake. BUT, you have to go to class. No attendance policy, but the test material all comes from class. You don't need the book, just get your butt to class. Easy easy easy.

If you are the type that can put forth little effort in a class,hardly show up but yet find some way to get a B or higher you should def. take this class.If you need a class where you need a direct set of notes and know EXACTLY what you need to study for a test don't take this class.Very nice and lenient but often goes of topic.
Best prof ever! Puts his heart into his work to make course interesting and entertaining. Highly recommend.

Mr. Simpson is a great Professor, he want's to see you achieve, he is always willing to answer you questions and he makes the class interesting, science can be boring but he tries to keep it light. He's aware that we are not taking this class to become scientist but just to graduate. I like his approach to teaching, not intimidating just helpful. H

Simpson is a trip. Took him for 1102 only. This guy just looks for ways to get off topic. He's facsinating, intelligent, humble. Class is so refreshing. Having said that, test questions and answers are completely random-kinda comfusing and annoying. B in the class. Only take this guy for science!

I got an A in this class.  Someone commented that he does not look at the labs but he does test on them so do the labs! He is non traditional and related science to real life.  I enjoyed his class.  I did not think it was an easy A but a worthwhile class.

I had no interest in Science, but this Professor does an excellent job in getting you interested.  He is very helpful and wants you to do well.  He gives a lot of questions on the test, but if you read the chapters and come to class, you should make no less than a "B".  I am trying to take him for 1102.
Take him. He is very helpful and understanding. He loves science and makes it interesting.

I have mixed feelings on the course. He is kind of confusing, and a lot of people that went everyday did worse than people that never came. The tests had a lot of opinion questions where a few of the options could be right, but you had to figure out which one he was talking about. He is a nice guy though.

I got an A in this class, but he seems easier than he actually is. He can be very confusing about what to expect on test. He doesn't actually look at the labs though, and if you ask him about test questions he gives pretty fair hints. Just don't walk up there too much. Make sure you pay attention to the powerpoints and you don't need the book.
Prof. Simpson is an amazing teacher. He really tries to help us apply what science to our life. You just have to take notes from power point, and show up in class.
If you attend class you don't need the book. If you don't plan on going, you will need the book. Had him summer semester and almost always got out early. Great prof, keeps class interesting.

After making you buy the $130 book, he later tells you that you don't really need it to pass the class. He is awful about keeping students informed about test dates and offers 300 point extra credit assignments to a select few students, which means they get A's and skip the final, while everybody else works twice as hard.

Mr. Simpson has reached and overachieved the definition of a great teacher.  His excitement and dedication towards this class has made it a pleasure to attend class regularly.  Not only is he highly knowledgeable in the science field but his "go green" personality has inspired me to care for our earth even more than before.  Even though there are o
Guy is great, will be taking him again for the next class everything is easy and mostly common sense.  TAKE HIM HE IS GREAT!!!!!!

Both 1101 and 1102. 90% of the test ?'s are very easy is you go to class and take notes. If you do this, you really don't even need the book. He doesn't post his notes/slides online. He is very laid back and nice, but I can't say I learned much. Easy A.

Professor Simpson was a HOOT! Learned a great deal about enivornment science and birds. You will need to attend class and the his test are abit tricky and commonsense, so take good notes and go to class and you will get an "A". He is funny and comes to class ready to teach you something new and fun. You will laugh our loud in this class often.

Considering I went to a private high school with a huge emphasis on the natural sciences, I did not learn much from this class.  Prof Simpson reads right off the slides and most of his test questions are either from the slides, book, or presentations given in class.  However, I thought there was too much emphasis put on Disney's environmental work

This dude makes science awesome!! way cool teacher. One of my favorite prof. at kennesaw. I hated science before this class, but this dude made it interesting. Made me want to go to class. Take simpson!!

Simpson is an amazing teacher. He really tries to help us apply what science to our life and he's so funny. YOu just have to take notes and some test questions are on the book. His tests are out of the blue sometimes.

So far I have not learned a single thing. Lessons are completely off topic. I don't think he knows anything about science. All he does is read straight from the slides and then test questions come from presentations and websites that are irrelevant. This class is a waste of my time.
Simpson is the best.
YES. Take him. You have to be quick on the draw getting his class though because it will fill up quickly. Easy A and very funny.
Simpson's awesome!! Easy A. I was exempt from taking the final.
Very good professor put in some effort and you can get an A.
Easy class, interesting lectures. I got an A no problem. Just pay attention in class (But class isn't mandatory) and you will do fine.

Simpson is very funny and nice.  His tests have a good bit of very very easy questions and then some that you won't know the answer to at all.  He is easy in the sense that a lot of test questions don't require thinking and there is little work.  However, you never know what to expect on the tests, which is frustrating. I like him though.

I LOVE Mr.Simpson. His class is laid back and fun. He doesn't make this gen. ed course hard. I love coming to class because I know I'll have a good time. His notes are strait from the book so I read the book before the test and enjoy sitting back in class. TAKE HIM!!!!

Despite what others have negatively said about this professor, i found him to be extremely enlightening and easy as long as you pay attention and go to class. I took his 1101 and 1102 classes and got A's in both ....take the class with a close friend so yall can share one book that is used in both 1101 and 1102

I don't care what these people say, I absolutely ADORE having had Prof Simpson for both 1101 and 1102 this semester. Is he sometimes ridiculously easy? YES, but we are college students and having a class that is more laid back and talks about real, pertinent natural science issues in the world today rather than facts, facts, facts has been great!

This class is useless, his style of teaching does not benefit students at all.His class is a joke and students grades suffer because of it. You never know what to study or how to study for his test He should spend more time adding structure to his course than being cool. Don't believe the hype, do not take this class!

This class is not for people who like to know what is going on as far as testing material, etc. We didn't use the book. There were test ?'s based on opinion. You were counted wrong if your opinion didn't match what it "should" have been. I got a good grade, but I was stressed the whole time. He is very nice and laid back, but I like more structure.

Easy class. Prof. Simpson is a great guy! He may be a little corny at time but he is really genuine in his efforts. Those who think that is class is "useless" I completely disagree. Just because is class isn't another boring lecture doesn't mean its useless. He simply tries to teach about things that are relevant to life in a more relaxed way.
attendence is not manditory but its strongly advised. its very interesting and easy. is perfect for the non science student

This was one of the most interesting classes i have take at Kennesaw.  I took this class in the fall and failed the class, but when he taught it I got an A.  His test questions may be ridiculous, but I learned more this time around than the first.  Dont bash the guy cause he is borderline hippy.

This class was awful. Prof did not teach. Classes were a little lecture and a lot of presentations from classmates. If you presented you got extra credit but that was not announced in the syllabus or to the class. Two tests, he does add a few points to your final test grades. Not clear on what to study and, his commentary is inappropriate.

This is a tough guy to review. He's nice. But, I don't know if he really takes his job that seriously. His lectures are all over the place, WHEN he does them. He'd be happy just letting students do their presentations all semester about things that are borderline science. The first page of the final had 10 questions about Disneyworld.

Grades are based on 2 tests. Can get extra credit if you present. It's not am easy class and you won't learn anything, but if you are happy with a B, take Simpson. He doesn't know anything about science or the environment, but he doesn't take attendance and gives extra credit so it's not too bad.

I find it funny when people say it's a waste of class. If you want a hard class goodness don't take him. He's really funny. Not some stiff that just lectures, he relates it to life with funny stories. If you pay attention you'll be fine, the book isn't necessary unless you LOVE taking notes on common sense.
I adore this man! He's awesome. Enough said!

If you take any other professor for science you are missing out on the most fun and entertaining class ever. I had King for 1101 and when I had Simpson for 1102 I actually found fun and enjoyment in science. He is always jovial and he cares about every single student. Very funny. DO NOT TAKE ANY OTHER PROFESSOR FOR SCIENCE!

Mr. Simpson is awesome. He doesn't teach from the book (which makes class interesting), he shares personal experiences and likes to discuss current events in the world. Easy grade if you attend class. Easily my favorite class and favorite prof. He is hilarious and knowledgeable, he brings environmental science to a reality.

I wish I had never signed up for this pathetic class. I have not learned ONE thing this semester, he is so incredibly off topic and frustrating. The only thing that I may have learned is his love for Lobsters. Everyday I wished I had skipped, because no benefit came out of that class. DO NOT TAKE HIM!

This class was a waste.The tests were pathetically dumbed down. I never took notes and didn't buy the textbook and made As on his tests. Hes funny, but if you dont like wasting your tuition money on a BS class, dont take it. Easy A, but frustratingly so. Also, he though the Disney monorails ran on cooking oil and didn't respond when corrected.

Really laid back Professor. Likes the class to have discussions.Cares what his students care about. Teaches science in a very different way-- he makes it applicable to life.Instead of having your head buried in a book the whole semester, you'll be more aware of your environment & ways to improve the quality of your life. Highly recommend him.Enjoy!

Really laid back Professor. Likes the class to have discussions.Cares what his students care about. Teaches science in a very different way-- he makes it applicable to life.Instead of having your head buried in a book the whole semester, you'll be more aware of your environment & ways to improve the quality of your life. Highly recommend him.Enjoy!

I don't know who thought this guy was good, but he is awful. He is so off topic that I don't even know if he really has a degree. His tests do not even cover real science material...it is ridiculous. He does not take attendance, but you should actually show up because he only puts questions about the videos he shows or from guest speakers.
It's not gonna get any easier than this..

Very nice teacher. You don't need to buy a text book because his tests don't come from text books. Show a lot of video that will be on his tests. Very funny guy and fair.Take him if you need an easy A and relax class. I enjoyed him

Prof. Simpson is awesome! He is a great guy (a little off color at times) but is really fun and keeps the class light.  I'm not a fan of his test, because they have rediculous questions.  I made a B on the first test, as did most people.

He is so much fun! The material he teaches is important and applicable for everyday living. Really cares about keeping the students engaged in conversation and discussion. A surprisingly refreshing course!! Love Him!!!!!

I really disliked his class. Maybe he was easy for everyone and their brother, but I have made all A's until his class and received a B. I hate stupid questions and I felt everything concerning this class was stupid... including test questions. Just an opinion. Nice guy. Just not a great teacher. You can tell he rather be digging up rocks.

Professor Simpson has to be the best professor at KSU. Extremely helpful guy, makes his class fair and easy. Gives extra credit on tests, plenty of extra credit. As long as you stay awake in his class its impossible to not make an A. I repeat, impossible to not make an A

Mr. Simpson was my favorite teacher the entire year! He is super nice, and has a way of teaching that keeps you interested, but not bored. His tests are super easy, and I really loved the fact that he didnt try to trick us on tests. He gives extra credit, so make sure you go to class!
This Professor is Amazing!!!! He teaches you real life lessons about Science. Be careful ladies....It is easy to develop a crush on this Professor. He reminds me of a teddy bear! He is HOT!

This Professor is Amazing!!!! He teaches you real life lessons about Science. This has been my favorite class. Also, Professor Simpson is so cute. It is easy to get a crush. Get ready girls.....He is HOT!

His class is awesome!  You'll learn so much about the environment without realizing you're learning. It's a blast.  You need to come to class to watch the movies b/c there are many questions on the test regarding the movies and his lecture.  He's a great professor and actually makes science fun.
I loved Mr.Simpson he was the best teacher I have ever had. The easiest A you will get in all of your college classes...if you can take him...take him you will not be sorry at all

Not your typical teacher! Lectures are extremely helpful and if he knows who you are, you are better off. LOTS of extra credit. However, if you don't think like he does the tests will be really hard. Mostly T/F questions that have to do with what he thinks is important, but you never really know what that is until you read the test. Easy labs too.

Mr. Simpson is an amazing teacher. I may not have learned everything in the book, but I learned a ton of life lessons. He teaches science, but also life lessons. I recommend him. He offers tons of extra credit and has a review before every test. The labs are a pain to do, but once you start them they are well worth the points. Pick him if you can!

this class is a joke and so is the teacher! He does not teach, I have not learned a thing in this class all semester!! All he does is make fat jokes about himself and when he tried to teach he always starts talking about totally unrelated things! the test are a joke too! just go sit there and be bored out of your mind and you will pass.
Best professor at KSU!  He will definitely make you laugh!  He makes learning boring science fun.  Take him and you will be glad you did! I have truly enjoyed spending my summer with him.
Best class I ever took. This teacher is the best. Easy class.

Don't even think about taking someone else. If he doesn't fit into your schedule, MAKE HIM FIT. Easiest A you will EVER... EVER earn in college. He's hysterical, caring, and fun. I took it at 8:00 on a Saturday. Yes, it's that necessary. Don't buy the book. Don't even study. Just show up and take the test and laugh at the funny choices.
Take this prof! He likes to talk about things like gas prices and how to save on fuel costs. The labs were graded on effort, not so much the answers. Get this class!
Awesome prof! He makes you want to get up early on a Sat. to come to class - alot of interesting presentations - material that will be on the test. Has wonderful insight on the environment. Take him!

Mr. G is GREAT. I take him on Sat mornings and he gives you a reason to want to take a class on the WEEKEND. Coming to class is not mandatory, but if you want to pass he recommends that you be there. He keeps you motivated and often  refers the work as BOLOGNA SCIENCE.. I am taking him agian for 1102 this fall .TAKE HIM, YOULL BE GLAD YOU DID!!

BEST PROF EVER! I would highly recommend him to anyone! Until I took this course, I had no interest in science, now I love it. Very easy to work with if you have any questions or miss a class. As long as you show up and pay attention, you will do very well. Not a hard class or very work intensive, but you will learn a lot!

This prof is the best.  People that complain are just unhappy deadheads, wasting the time surfing the web on laptop instead of paying attention.  You get out of the class what you put in.  Garey is very helpful and aware of the students needs. High energy class participation.  TAKE HIM you will be glad you did, he made college fun again.
Best professor ever! Very interesting and keeps the class upbeat. He keeps you awake with his humor and will even dance! Take this professor :)

This teacher is AWESOME!!!!  If you have to take Science 1102, take this professor.  Its not about what is in the book as much as what is going on in the world today.  There are many current event discussions and videos for this class.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this professor!!!
hilarious. awesome teacher!

PERFECT teacher for a lower level class! Understands that science 1102 is a required course and does not expect his students to be science majors! Class is not mandatory and can sometimes seem pointless, but discussions & movies shown in class will be used on test. Didnt crack the book, tests were Extremely Easy! HIGHLY RECCOMEND!! EASY A!!

A very helpful professor who makes a general education course at Kennesaw State University fun and exciting. The only complaint I would have is that the test do not reflect the content in the seventy five dollar text book we required to purchase.

Very easy guy!! So nice and he attempts humor, doesn't always work, but hey he's easy to listen to. Tests are SUPER easy. Attendance isn't a must. I went to the class mostly just on tests day and passed with flying colors. But, go and enjoy his fun.
HOrrible Teacher. No way to study for the class. Waste of time. Does not prepare students for any thing useful. Test totally random.

Prof Simpson is one of the coolest guys you will ever meet (get to know him!). He truly cares about his students. He wants everyone to succeed, his class is about the environment and your impact on the world. The class is extremely easy. Never use the book but just talk about issues. Go to class watch the films and its a guarenteed A.

Nice guy - horrible professor. People like him cause he's "funny" and it's an "easy A". I didn't learn anything. We discussed random stuff in class, sometimes environmental, but we had someone do STAND UP comedy during class. Tests were all over the place. On some questions he said answer could go either way yet marked wrong. we never used book btw
Highly recomend! You have to attend class for the tests, because the tests are over the class discussions.

COOL GUY! Such a hippie! You DO NOT need the book...just pay attention in class...his tests are over ALL the topics we discuss in class so pay attention...here's a tip...on his tests...CHOOSE all of the above if given...think like HE (the prof NOT Jesus) would and you'll get an A! You learn a lot with all the discussions!

This prof is crazy! He is sometimes funny (even dirty). I may recommend him to someone who likes smth out of subject, easy going. I've never met a prof like this. I hate his tests. None of the questions were from the book.You don't know what to expect.The questions were from his movies and the presentations. Be attentive to stuff he says in class.
Easiest grade you will ever get. He rambles and goes off topic a lot, but very helpful and tests are easy to understand and pass. No reason you shouldn't get an A in his class

Simpson is the best teacher Ive ever had at Kennesaw. The class is very easy and you don't have to show up. He didnt take attendance and gave 20 pts one day to anyone who was there, just for the hell of it. We watched alot of film and had a lot of discussion on interesting topics. Hardly used to book. Hes really funny and your never bored.Easy test
One word...Awesome!I highly recommend to anyone to take him :-)

One of my fav professors!Laid back,funny,very helpful.Tests were easy,tho you must go to class to know most answers.Extra credit for projects that benefit the environment.Doesn't believe in overly difficult tests or long,, boring lectures.Everyone should take his class,you'll actual learn something important!

Mr. Simpson is the BEST teacher EVER! U do not have to go to class and you will still pass with an A. Just show up for tests. DO EXTRA CREDIT and you will have an A no matter what Take him if you can!!!

I was a little disappointed that we didn't actually do anything Earth Science-related after we finished the Geology sections.  All tests & grades were from papers and/or easy little projects.  Very nice guy, but you don't get much from the class. Don't bother buying the book.

Best teaher at Kennesaw State Cares about everyone When i was in class we had 3 test the whole semester and if you didn't want to take them the only thing you had to do was do a presentation on anything you wanted to and you could have up to 8 people in your group to do it and everyone got an A an even if you just took the test it was still easy

Nicest teacher EVER!!!! If you participate in class he will never give you a hard time. All  he wants you to do is talk and act interested.  Attend class, participate and do the easy labs and you will def. get an A. Very nice and caring man!!!

Simpson is very humorous, and he contributes not only to learning but also provides easy solutions to help the earth. Everyone says the tests were easy but I overanalyzed b/c I wasn't really sure where he was coming from.

i think he's going a little bit crazy... at the beginning of the semester he was cool but i think he realizes his class is a joke so now he's going psycho. so go to class and listen to the rants about how we're killing the earth and we're all gonna die if we don't drink starbucks. oh, and watch that al gore movie and pretend you love it.

This guy is the best professor at Kennesaw State University. Very nice guy, a professor can not get better than this. He makes the class extremely easy and convinient. His tests are so easy and almost fun to do. This is a must class that you need to take, free A basically.
GREAT PROFESSOR, PERIOD!  Can be kinda corny, but class could be interesting sometimes.  Really cool guy.

I absolutely resent KSU requiring 1101 AND 1102. Of all the courses useful to you after graduation 1101 and especially 1102 rank EXTREMELY low. Why not require a foreign language instead? Anyway, considering we must take 1102 I am extremely grateful to have taken Simpson. No stress, some learning, usually enjoyable and an easy A.
YOU'D BE A FOOL NOT TO TAKE THIS CLASS. I WENT TO CLASS 4 TIMES AND GOT AN 'A'

He is the best teacher!!! his class was very easy and I didn't even read all of the chapters all of the way through and i passed the tests easily. He doesn't make you do all of the labs. He just asks that you turn in the Capstones which there are only four and they only take 5 minutes. Very cool Too!!!

Very easy A. Didn't learn much at all. A VERY nice man but a poor lecturer. He cares about students, is VERY paternal just not a good prof if you want to learn. But an easy A if you can tolerate sitting through class and hearing about his children, life, wife and anything since everything is, it seems, is related to environmental science.
EASY A!!

Easiest class I ever took.  Super nice instructor.  Hated doing the labs, but doesn't everyone?  Should be an easy A for anyone.  You will definitely become more aware of your contributions to the environment!!!
You won't learn much in his class. But you will laugh and laugh and laugh. He is the funniest Professor at K.S.U. That's all I can really say.

A really fun class to go to. Always talking about what is on his mind. Loves to Google random stuff and your going to get an A if you stay awake and sit there. I really good pic for a Sci 1101 teacher! Great Guy...

He is a good teacher. He teaches concepts instead of forgettable, unuseful information. He tries to get the students to engague but most of them are lacking in participation skills. Those are the ones who do not like him (as a teacher).

The worst professor I've ever come in contact with. If you want an easy A and you don't like to come to class, take this class. He didn't lecture one time when I took him. He gave everyone the option of making a presentation on anything (doesn't even have to be science-related) instead of taking the final. So, everyone sits there and watches boring

The BEST Prof. ever. He is sooo much fun and makes the material interesting. He will do everything in his power to help you out. Easy A. The test questions are always TRUE or all of the above. He is great. I highly recommend taking him.

Awesome teacher.  You don't really have to come to class much.  But he makes the class entertaining so it's a fun class to go to.  Great guy, very laid back.  Easy class!  Tests are pretty much all common sense questions.  You won't need the book at all!!!
THIS IS THE BEST CLASS I'VE EVER TAKEN AND I HATE SCIENCE. HE IS SUCH A NICE GUY AND WILL GO OUT OF HIS WAY TO HELP YOU. IF YOU TAKE THIS CLASS AND TRY, YOU SHOULD DEF. GET AN A.

Mr. Simpson is the best. His class was very interesting and helpful with everyday stuff. He is awsome and I highly recomend him. Mr. Simpson if you ever read this, YOU ROCKKK p.s. BS means BOLOGNA SCIENCE, you'll see what I mean.

He is the best!! I hate science and early mornings, but did not miss 1 class. Very fair and test are not bad. Class in fun and lots of opiniated discussions.  No tipical science jargon, or BS just how to be aware of your environment.  Strongly recomend!!!

Great teacher always willing and able to help his students. He made Science class fun (believe it or not). I STRONGLY RECOMMEND him!!!!!!!! Wasn't able to take him for 1102, but he still helped me in 1102 if I had a problem.
Nice man- loves his students. Only drawback are the tests- He doesn't go over all of the material and some of the questions are controversial. Take him if you're not a science major.

If you are a non-science major, and especially if you're sick of all the freaking core classes and just want a simple freaking class, THIS is the class for you.  It's simply impossible not to make an A in this guy's class.  His tests are easy and he's fun to listen to. You won't learn a whole lot about textbook science, but you're learn alot about science as it pertains to current events and real life.  NO ATTENDANCE POLICY.

He was extremely easy but also very intersting and fun. He made every class enjoyable and had no attendence policy. He was very open to people's opionion and interests and was an overall great teacher!
great guy       you will learn a thing or two but not have to work from an A at all

Excellent. Exams are not difficult, class is interesting, really cares about students. If you are having problems or cant take a test, go see him and he will work with you. Some test questions are from the book. Lectures are interesting and NOT just a repeat of the book, He likes class participation
Very easy.  No final if you do a presentation on anything you want relating to environmental science.  Take him
Very easy going teacher. Grades lightly on labs, you only turn in the Capatones, and the final exam can be exchanged for a research paper or a presentation in front of the class.
